mapper.sql: id, unit_code, unit_name,contact,phone,email,address,client_secrect, is_lock, white_ip, max_per_minute, remark, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert: insert into open_unit_account (id, unit_code, unit_name,contact,phone,email,address, client_secrect, is_lock, white_ip, max_per_minute,remark,gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientSecrect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLock,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{whiteIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxPerMinute,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},now(), now())

id,
unit_code,
unit_name,
contact,

mapper.update:
update open_unit_account
unit_code = #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact=#{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email=#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address=#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
client_secrect = #{clientSecrect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_lock = #{isLock,jdbcType=TINYINT},
white_ip = #{whiteIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
max_per_minute = #{maxPerMinute,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_modified = now()
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update open_unit_account set unit_code = #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact=#{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email=#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address=#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_secrect = #{clientSecrect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_lock =#{isLock,jdbcType=TINYINT}, white_ip = #{whiteIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_per_minute = #{maxPerMinute,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = now() where id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from open_unit_account where 1=1
and(unit_code like concat('%',#{unitCode},'%'))
and( unit_name like concat('%',#{unitName},'%'))
and( email like concat('%',#{email},'%'))
and( phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%'))
and (is_lock=#{lock})
order by gmt_modified desc

select
from open_unit_account where 1=1
and( unit_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or unit_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )
order by gmt_modified desc
